thread.title: Celebrities share photos from their summer vacations [Photos]
thread.title_full: Celebrities share photos from their summer vacations [Photos]

title: Celebrities share photos from their summer vacations [Photos]
text:
Thursday, July 23, 2015 08:00 AM EDT Celebrities share photos from their summer vacations Previous Next 
Where did your favourite celebrities holiday this summer? The stars have been sharing photos of their summer vacation photos on picture-sharing site Instagram and we've rounded up some of the best. (Instagram) 
Kim Kardashian shared this photo of herself with Minnie and Mickey during her summer trip to Disneyland. (Kim Kardashian/Instagram) 
Taylor Swift took a trip to London with friends Joe Jonas and Karlie Kloss and boyfriend Calvin Harris. "Little known fact: Karlie is secretly an unofficial historian/London tour guide. Kind of," she wrote when posting this photo to Instagram. (Taylor Swift/Instagram) 
Justin Bieber shared this photo of himself hanging poolside on his Instagram account. (Justin Bieber/Instagram) 
Reese Witherspoon is enjoying the sun on her summer holiday, posting this photo with the caption "Greetings from Paradise!" (Reese Witherspoon/Instagram) 
Kendall Jenner shared this photo of herself hanging out poolside. (Kendall Jenner/Instagram) 
Drake posted this nighttime beach photo to Instagram with the caption "Views." (Drake/Instagram) 
Sofia Vergara and fiance Joe Manganiello enjoyed some family time this summer. She posted this photo with the caption "Family" on Instagram. (Sofia Vergara/Instagram) 
One Direction singer Niall Horan hit the greens this summer, posting this photo with the caption "Great laugh on the golf course today with our Steven ... Buzzin la !" (Niall Horan/Instagram) 
Jenna Dewan Tatum shared this photo of herself lounging by the beach. "Selfie with rare LA thunderstorm behind me," she captioned the photo. (Jenna Dewan Tatum/Instagram) 
Rihanna relaxes in the sun in this photo she shared on her Instagram. (Rihanna/Instagram) 
Idris Elba is spending his summer DJing in Ibiza. He posted this photo to Instagram with the caption "This was two nights ago at Pacha Ibiza." (Idris Elba/Instagram) 
Beyonce looks relaxed as she enjoys her summer holidays. (Beyonce/Instagram) 
Shania Twain caught this beach sunset and posted the photo to Instagram with the caption "Currently visiting the beautiful city of Jacksonville, FL." (Shania Twain/Instagram) 
Alyssa Milano visited New York City this summer, posting this photo to Instagram with the caption "My office today..." (Alyssa Milano/Instagram) 
One Direction singer Liam Payne shared this photo from his summer trip to Universal Studios. "Can't believe Ive been cast for Jurassic park 5 thanks so universal, can't wait to start filming," he said on Instagram. (Liam Payne/Instagram) 
Jessica Alba and her family took a trip to Universal Studios Orlando this summer. She shared this photo on Instagram with the caption "Family fun day." (Jessica Alba/Instagram) 
Britney Spears visited her hometown this summer for some R&R. She posted this photo to Instagram with the caption "So nice to be home! Nothing like Louisiana boys." (Britney Spears/Instagram) 
Katy Perry travelled to Greece this summer. She shared this photo with the caption "oh my Goddess." (Katy Perry/Instagram) 
Cristiano Ronaldo shared this photo of himself with friends hitting the waves. (Cristiano Ronaldo/Instagram) 
Kelly Clarkson visited New York City's American Museum of Natural History this summer with her family. She posted this photo to Instagram with the caption "My family & I had an amazing night at the museum! Thank you @AMNH :) it was awesome & unforgettable!!" (Kelly Clarkson/Instagram)
